title: Double thread
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Kindergarten
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Social interaction in children
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social interaction in children
description: How the daily routine is organised for the children's own needs in a modern well-equipped nursery school in England. Every activity is designed to help the individual child's development, and to encourage their adjustment to social and group relationships. The "double thread" refers to the inter-relations of home and kindergarten in the growing child's life.
